document_data.mainbody:
The Warhawks were an adventurer company who operated circa 1369 DR.
In the , the Warhawks attended a party hosted by Lord Partic Thistle at Thistleflame Keep in Suzail. The occasion was King Azoun Obarskyr IVs birthday, and Lord Thistle hoped to improve the standing of adventuring companies in Cormyr by having them present themselves as a gesture of fealty to the King.
* Bartek Alforael
* Kassandre Malari
